name: atom-ide-console
author: Amin Yahyaabadi
description: Aggregate and display output from various sources and provide an user interface for REPL-like functionality.

scripts.babel: npm run clean && shx cp -r src dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=false babel dist --out-dir dist
scripts.dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=true rollup -c -w
scripts.bundle: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=true rollup -c

maximumMessageCount.title: Maximum Message Count
maximumMessageCount.description: The number of messages to retain in the console

maximumSerializedMessages.title: Maximum Serialized Messages
maximumSerializedMessages.description: The number of messages to save across Nuclide sessions

maximumSerializedHistory.title: Maximum Serialized History
maximumSerializedHistory.description: The number of input history lines to save across sessions

diffUrlPattern.title: Diff URL Pattern
diffUrlPattern.description: The URL to link D1234567 text to. (%s will be replaced with the match.)

taskUrlPattern.title: Task URL Pattern
taskUrlPattern.description: The URL to link T1234567 text to. (%s will be replaced with the match.)

fontScale.title: Font Scale
fontScale.description: The scale of the font used in the console relative to the editor font size.

DEPRECATED-nuclide.registerExecutor.description: Register an object that can execute code.
